args.name: power
args.question: Do you want to turn the tv on or off?

set_power.doc: turn off the TV (turning on is not supported)
set_power.canonical: set power on lg webos tv

raise_volume.doc: increase the volume of the tv
raise_volume.confirmation: increase the volume on your LG WebOS TV
raise_volume.confirmation_remote: increase the volume on $__person's LG WebOS TV
raise_volume.canonical: raise volume on lg webos tv

lower_volume.doc: lower the audio volume on the tv
lower_volume.confirmation: decrease the volume on your LG WebOS TV
lower_volume.confirmation_remote: decrease the volume on $__person's LG WebOS TV
lower_volume.canonical: lower volume on lg webos tv

args.name: percent
args.question: What volume do you want to set (in percent)?

set_volume.doc: set the volume on this device to the given percent value
set_volume.confirmation: set the volume on your LG WebOS TV to $percent%
set_volume.confirmation_remote: set the volume on $__person's LG WebOS TV to $percent%
set_volume.canonical: set volume on lg webos tv

mute.doc: change the mute status on the tv

unmute.doc: change the mute status on the tv

args.name: url
args.question: What video do you want to play? Use the full URL.

play_url.doc: start playing a video by URL
play_url.confirmation: play $url on your LG WebOS TV
play_url.canonical: play url on lg webos tv

examples.utterance: set the power on my lg tv to ${p_power}
raise the volume of my lg tv
lower the volume of my lg tv
set the volume of my lg tv to ${p_percent}
play link ${p_url:const} on my lg tv
